org.eclipse.californium.core.coap

Class CoAP

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.californium.core.coap.CoAP

  • public final class CoAP
extends Object
    CoAP defines several constants.
    • Message types: CON, NON, ACK, RST
    • Request codes: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
    • Response codes
    • Option numbers
    • Message format
    See Also:
    OptionNumberRegistry, MediaTypeRegistry

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CoAP.Code
      The enumeration of request codes: GET, POST, PUT and DELETE.
      static class  CoAP.CodeClass
      The enumeration of request codes: GET, POST, PUT and DELETE.
      class  CoAP.MessageFormat
      CoAP message format.
      static class  CoAP.ResponseCode
      The enumeration of response codes
      static class  CoAP.Type
      CoAP defines four types of messages: Confirmable, Non-confirmable, Acknowledgment, Reset.

    • Method Detail

      • getCodeClass

        public static int getCodeClass(int code)
        Gets the code class of a given CoAP code.
        Parameters:
        code - the code.
        Returns:
        the value represented by the three most significant bits of the code.

      • getCodeDetail

        public static int getCodeDetail(int code)
        Gets the code detail of a given CoAP code.
        Parameters:
        code - the code.
        Returns:
        the value represented by the five least significant bits of the code.

      • formatCode

        public static String formatCode(int code)
        Gets the string representation of a CoAP code.
        Parameters:
        code - the CoAP code.
        Returns:
        a string following the pattern C.DD where C is the code class nd DD is the code detail.

      • isTcpProtocol

        public static boolean isTcpProtocol(String protocol)
        Checks, if provided protocol is PROTOCOL_TCP or PROTOCOL_TLS.
        Parameters:
        protocol - protocol to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if the provided protocol matchs one of the list above, false, otherwise.

      • getSchemeForProtocol

        public static String getSchemeForProtocol(String protocol)
        Get scheme for protocol.
        Parameters:
        protocol - protocol
        Returns:
        scheme
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if protocol is not supported

      • isSecureProtocol

        public static boolean isSecureProtocol(String protocol)
        Checks, if provided protocol is PROTOCOL_DTLS or PROTOCOL_TLS.
        Parameters:
        protocol - protocol to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if the provided protocol matchs one of the list above, false, otherwise.

      • isTcpScheme

        public static boolean isTcpScheme(String uriScheme)
        Checks, if provided scheme is COAP_TCP_URI_SCHEME or COAP_SECURE_TCP_URI_SCHEME.
        Parameters:
        uriScheme - scheme to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if the provided scheme match one of the list above, false, otherwise.

      • isSecureScheme

        public static boolean isSecureScheme(String uriScheme)
        Checks, if provided scheme is COAP_SECURE_URI_SCHEME or COAP_SECURE_TCP_URI_SCHEME.
        Parameters:
        uriScheme - scheme to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if the provided scheme match one of the list above, false, otherwise.

      • isSupportedScheme

        public static boolean isSupportedScheme(String uriScheme)
        Checks, if provided scheme is COAP_URI_SCHEME, COAP_SECURE_URI_SCHEME, COAP_TCP_URI_SCHEME or COAP_SECURE_TCP_URI_SCHEME.
        Parameters:
        uriScheme - scheme to be checked
        Returns:
        true, if the provided scheme match one of the list above, false, otherwise.

      • getDefaultPort

        public static int getDefaultPort(String uriScheme)
        Get default port for provided uri scheme.
        Parameters:
        uriScheme - uri scheme for default port
        Returns:
        default port
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if provided uri scheme is not supported.
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_COAP_PORT, DEFAULT_COAP_SECURE_PORT

      • isRequest

        public static boolean isRequest(int code)
        Checks if a given CoAP code is a request code.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to check.
        Returns:
        true if the code's class is 0 and 1 <= detail <= 31.

      • isResponse

        public static boolean isResponse(int code)
        Checks if a given CoAP code is a response code.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to check.
        Returns:
        true if 1 < code class <6 and 0 <= detail <= 31.

      • isEmptyMessage

        public static boolean isEmptyMessage(int code)
        Checks if a given CoAP code is the empty message code.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to check.
        Returns:
        true if code == 0.

      • isObservable

        public static boolean isObservable(CoAP.Code code)
        Checks if a given CoAP code is a observable method.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to check.
        Returns:
        true if code is GET or FETCH.
